recipe.title: Citrus Salad with Star Anise
ingredients: 4 whole star anise or 1 teaspoon anise seeds
3 assorted grapefruits such as white, pink, and ruby
instructions: Simmer water with sugar and anise in a small saucepan over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, 1 minute. Cool slightly. Cut peel and white pith from grapefruits and oranges with a sharp knife. Working over a bowl, cut grapefruit and orange sections free from membranes. Pour off juice released during cutting from bowl and reserve. Stir syrup into fruit and chill, covered, 1 hour. Stir in reserved juice to taste.
